column4: Host Desktop Management Interface (DMI) environment information
Indicates if there was a problem getting information for the filesystem
Indicates if the filesystem is readonly
Available memory in bytes by node
Corrupted bytes in hardware by node
Total bytes of memory by node
A counter metric that counts the number of seconds the CPU has been running in a particular mode
Total number of CPUs available to Nexus per NUMA
Total number of CPUs per NUMA allocated for Nexus Kubernetes and Tenant Workloads
Total number of CPUs per NUMA available to Nexus Kubernetes and Tenant Workloads
Number of active interfaces per bonding interface
NUMA huge pages total by node
Node network Maximum Transmission Unit (mtu_bytes) value of /sys/class/net/
Value is 1 if operstate is 'up', 0 otherwise.
Non-numeric data from /sys/class/nvme/, value is always 1. Provides firmware, model, state and serial for a device
Maximum time error between the local system and reference clock
Time offset in between the local system and reference clock
Is clock synchronized to a reliable server (1 = yes, 0 = no)
Information in /proc/vmstat pertaining to the field oom_kill
Information in /proc/vmstat pertaining to the field pswpin
Information in /proc/vmstat pertaining to the field pswpout
